Blood 7

Astral Corruption
Ritual
B6S6
spell id [id]: 1102
effect number [effect_number]: 81
damage [damage]: 57
number of effects [nreff]: 1
gems required [gemcost]: 166B
Enchant Battlefield | Enchant World:Astral Corruption
This horrible ritual is the cause of Blood magic being banned in ancient times. With an awesome sacrifice, the fabric of astral space becomes tainted with blood. All spell casting uses the tainted Arcana and attracts the attention of Horrors. Every time a non-Blood magic ritual is cast or a magic item is forged, there is a chance that a Horror will follow the arcane flow and attack the mage.
